COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110
STRING: Dear Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126
STRING: You asked me to tell you what I felt for Torta, so I will
answer you honestly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144
STRING: I have feelings for Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158
STRING: It is the truth, and not something I can simply change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c
STRING: You said that you were already aware, but I truly only
realized this recently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a
STRING: I feel that if I write any more words, they will gradually
turn into lies, so I will keep this letter short.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8
STRING: I'm so sorry to be writing this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc
STRING: I understand that what I am doing is wrong by both
you, and Tortinita.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da
STRING: But the one thing I don't want to do, is lie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee
STRING: So, allow me to write one last thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202
STRING: You asked me not to write anything else, but I'm afraid
that's one request I cannot follow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222
STRING: I love you, Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x236
STRING: From the bottom of my heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24a
STRING: I know this does nothing more than prove my
unfaithfulness, but I couldn't help myself from saying it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x268
STRING: I'm truly sorry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286
STRING: Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d2
STRING: I continued reading that letter for a long, long time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de
STRING: It was a short letter, but I read it over and over again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ea
STRING: Chris wrote this letter not because he was unfaithful,
but quite to the contrary, because he was faithful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x300
STRING: What a cruel thing that was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30c
STRING: Sweet, cruel Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x318
STRING: If you had written only that you had feelings for
Tortinita, I would have gladly given everything for you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x338
STRING: If you had written only that you had feelings for Arietta,
I would have gladly given everything for you and her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x358
STRING: But you didn't do that, instead you wrote the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x364
STRING: Which I understand is exactly that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x370
STRING: But... You could have just answered my question, and
only that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37c
STRING: You could have just lied, like I always do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3aa
STRING: How would Arie have responded?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: What would she have done in this situation?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d2
STRING: [Arie] “Torta. Just do what makes you happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e8
STRING: The reflection of my sister in the mirror smiled back at
me, gently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x414
STRING: [Torta] “I'm so stupid...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42a
STRING: Whispering this, I looked away from the mirror.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x436
STRING: But... I felt that Arie would probably have really said
something like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x442
STRING: I can't go on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44e
STRING: Torta... Please look after Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45a
STRING: I wondered if she would smile at me gently, saying such
things.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x466
STRING: Or, would she scold me, saying that I would never have
Chris?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x486
STRING: [Torta] “Ha-ha... Aha-ha-ha!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49c
STRING: What I was doing was ridiculous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a8
STRING: To the point that it made me laugh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b4
STRING: What was I thinking?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c0
STRING: Arie wouldn't respond.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cc
STRING: Arie couldn't respond to anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d8
STRING: This was all just a fantasy of what I wanted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e4
STRING: Please look after Chris?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f0
STRING: A fantasy I imagined, because I wanted him to myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fc
STRING: She would scold me?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x508
STRING: Another fantasy I imagined, because I wanted her to
forgive me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x514
STRING: Arie wouldn't say anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x520
STRING: My sister wasn't capable of saying anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52c
STRING: She lay unconscious in a hospital bed, and just
continued to sleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x538
STRING: That was the truth, and there was nothing more to it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x544
STRING: That's all it was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x550
STRING: What was I supposed to do?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55c
STRING: [Torta] “I should just keep Chris for myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x572
STRING: Chris said that he had feelings for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57e
STRING: I could just write something like this in Arie's letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58a
STRING: “Torta will always be by your side.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x596
STRING: “I am no longer able to do so myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a2
STRING: If I wrote a letter saying goodbye... And then if I told
Chris my feelings one more time, I was sure he would
be mine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b8
STRING: Admit it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c4
STRING: Admit how terrible you are.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d0
STRING: And then, get what you want.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5dc
STRING: Get the person you love most,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ec
STRING: in the worst possible way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x622
STRING: I don't think I could look at a mirror ever again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65e
STRING: I walked along the street as I always did, with a letter in
my hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66a
STRING: I had written express delivery on the envelope with a
red pen, so it would arrive at my family's house
tomorrow, and then be sent back again by normal
means.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x680
STRING: And on Sunday, Chris would read it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68c
STRING: What kind of face would Chris make as he read it?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x698
STRING: And... What would it result in?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a4
STRING: I had no way of knowing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b0
STRING: All of this was nothing more than my wishful thinking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6bc
STRING: Telling all these lies, doing all these terrible things, I was
seeking a love that I was not sure I could even get.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d2
STRING: Thinking about all of this, I dragged my heavy feet and
finally arrived at the mailbox.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e8
STRING: All that was left was to send the letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f4
STRING: I just had to send it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x700
STRING: I raised my hand with the letter in it, and then lowered it
again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x756
STRING: How many hours had I been here since then?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x762
STRING: The sun was starting to go down, and the post man
would soon come to collect the letters inside the box.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x778
STRING: The post man seemed to be late for some reason or
another, and I was not sure if that was a good thing or
a bad thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x78e
STRING: I had already placed my letter in the box...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x79a
STRING: But, I had begun to second guess myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a6
STRING: It had taken me an hour to actually place my letter in
the mailbox.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b2
STRING: And now, I was considering telling the post man I had
made a mistake, and to have my letter returned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c8
STRING: I even thought foolishly that my hand might fit inside the
box, and that I could take the letter back right this
moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7de
STRING: In the end, I was still unsure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ea
STRING: Feeling contempt towards how horrible I was, I justified
it with there being no other choices, with the good side
of me still feeling unsure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x814
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x82a
STRING: I couldn't turn around to face the owner of that voice...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83e
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x854
STRING: [Torta] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86a
STRING: I finally raised my head the second time he called to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89c
STRING: [Chris] “H-Hey. I'm glad I bumped into you here. You
forgot your score.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8bc
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d2
STRING: I doubted that he had been watching me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8de
STRING: If he had seen me post the letter, he wouldn't have
taken this long to say something to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f4
STRING: Chris would have said something immediately.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91c
STRING: [Chris] “It'll get wet if I give it to you here, let's go over
there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93c
STRING: [Torta] “Ah... Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x952
STRING: I knew it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95e
STRING: He was just using the rain as an excuse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x986
STRING: [Chris] “Did you just send a letter...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99c
STRING: There was a hint of fear in his voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a8
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9da
STRING: [Chris] “To who?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f0
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0e
STRING: [Chris] “In that case, I'll guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa24
STRING: Seeming anxious, Chris went on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa30
STRING: It was easy to guess what he was going to say next, but
I stood there and waited for it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4e
STRING: [Chris] “You sent a letter to Arie, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa64
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7a
STRING: What did I write?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa86
STRING: He couldn't ask me that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa92
STRING: But if he did, I would tell another terrible lie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaba
STRING: [Chris] “Can I ask you what you wrote?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad0
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae6
STRING: Please don't...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0e
STRING: [Chris] “Actually, forget it. Anyway, have you finished
everything you needed to do today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2e
STRING: [Torta] “Actually... I had the day off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4c
STRING: [Chris] “By choice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb62
STRING: [Torta] “That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb94
STRING: [Chris] “And you used it... To write that letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbaa
STRING: I nodded silently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb6
STRING: I knew the world wasn't so forgiving as to let a simple
nod handle everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc2
STRING: People weren't that naive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbce
STRING: Chris was waiting silently for me to speak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbda
STRING: Waiting for the lies I would speak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe6
STRING: [Torta] “I... Got a letter from Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc04
STRING: [Chris] “On Sunday...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1a
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah... And she asked me something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc38
STRING: [Chris] “Which was?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4e
STRING: [Torta] “She asked me... If I had feelings for you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6c
STRING: [Chris] “And you sent that reply, just now...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc82
STRING: [Torta] “I sent a reply on Monday... But, I just had to
alter it. So, I sent another letter, just now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcac
STRING: Please forgive me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb8
STRING: Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc4
STRING: Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd8
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean... ‘Alter it’?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcee
STRING: I'm truly sorry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfa
STRING: [Torta] “At first... I wrote that I didn't like you. That I
didn't have feelings for you, Chris. But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1a
STRING: [Torta] “But I do... I really do have feelings for you, so I
wrote a new letter to Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3a
STRING: My tears were real.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd46
STRING: Was it regret, or was it admission?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd52
STRING: Sadness, or happiness?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5e
STRING: I may never be forgiven.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6a
STRING: But, I couldn't stop the lies that flowed from my mouth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9c
STRING: And then suddenly, Chris wrapped his arms around me
and hugged me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda8
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdbe
STRING: Just whispering that name made me feel happy, and
then sad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdca
STRING: In that instant, I wished that time would just stop.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd6
STRING: I would have been happy to die like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdea
STRING: It was not because I was happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfe
STRING: It was because I would never be happy again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0a
STRING: [Torta] “What I'm doing is terrible... I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe20
STRING: The apology I whispered didn't reach Chris's ears.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2c
STRING: Even if I had repeated it clearly, he would have
interpreted it differently anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe42
STRING: He would have thought it was an apology to Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4e
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe6c
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe82
STRING: Chris said my name, and squeezed me even tighter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8e
STRING: And...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9a
STRING: I stared at the mailbox.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea6
STRING: Watching from the corner of my eye as all of the letters
got collected, I raised my arms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xebc
STRING: My arms were shaking as I wrapped them around
Chris's waist.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec8
STRING: We held each other, without exchanging any words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee6
STRING: [Torta] “We've got rehearsal tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefc
STRING: [Torta] “I can't afford to catch another cold.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf12
STRING: I said this, and we parted ways.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1e
STRING: Chris however, said nothing.
